short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: click-to-call extension is a productivity tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: click-to-call extension is a productivity tool. this extension is made for business purposes. the extension will scan every website and identify mobile numbers. after the user selects the number from the website, the extension will show a popup with dial and text buttons. Users can dial or send a text message to the selected mobile number using this extension.
